regular.title: Regular Releases
regular.description: Releases made periodically, usually once a month, provides a stable Pulsar experience.

rolling.title: Rolling Releases
rolling.description: Releases built on every single commit to the Pulsar code repository. Has the latest fixes but may also have un-discovered bugs.

x86_64.title: x86_64
x86_64.description: For most desktops and laptops with Intel or AMD processors.

appimage.title: All distributions (Appimage)
alerts: Appimage may require `--no-sandbox` as an argument to run correctly on some systems.
Some distributions no longer ship with `libfuse2` which Appimage requires to run. You may need to install this manually, e.g. on Ubuntu >=22.04 `apt install libfuse2`.

windows.title: Windows
alerts: Windows binaries are not signed, so will produce an error with Windows Smartscreen, you can bypass this by clicking 'More info' then 'Run anyway'
